relatedRecords.name: BSides Colombia 2019
relatedRecords.description: BSides Colombia es un evento no comercial, que ha sido creado para introducir un concepto diferencial a los eventos tradicionales de seguridad de la información que se han realizado en el país.

relatedRecords.name: CodeMobile
relatedRecords.description: CodeMobile is a UK developer conference that has been created by developers who love creating apps in the mobile space. It’s an opportunity to network, share ideas and collaborate. The conference has two tracks, one focussed on iOS development, the other on Android.
